author: Shaffiabel
title: Moving To Bhubaneshwar
text: Good Afternoon Everyone. Im moving to Bhubaneshwar from Berhampur. Have a few questions. 1.Which is the best internet provider? 2.Where is the vegetable market? 3.Where can I go buy clothes beside Pantaloons? I'd like to support the little man so is there a street or area with small shops? 4.Where is the Fish & Meat market? 5.Which is a good cinema to see English movies? 6.I'd like to do some volunteer work, what organizations are there? 7.I'd like to find a good ladies tailor. 8. Where are the fabric shops? Just need information on Bhubaneshwar. Thanks a million. Shaffiabel
